name: Rice and Spinach
keywords: dairy-free, gluten-free, low cholesterol, low-fat, low-sodium, nut-free, long-grain rice, spinach, side dish
recipeIngredient: 8 ounces whole onion or 7 ounces chopped ready-cut onion (1 2/3 cups)
1 pound fresh loose spinach or 10 ounces fresh packaged spinach

recipeInstructions.text: While the onion is cooking (see chicken recipe), combine the rice and chicken broth, and bring to a boil in a heavy-bottomed pot. Cover and simmer, cooking for a total of 17 minutes.
When the onion is browned, stir it into the cooking rice.
Wash, trim and slice the scallions, and add to rice; continue cooking.
Wash and trim tough stems from spinach, and cut coarsely. About 2 minutes before the rice is ready, stir in the spinach, and finish cooking. Season with salt.
